author: wn.com
title: Libertarian tax protester Irwin Schiff dies in prison (Libertarian Party of New York)
text: ( Source : Libertarian Party of New York ) Libertarian Irwin Schiff , 87, who sought the LP nomination for president in 1996 , passed away on October 16 while serving time in federal prison for refusing to pay the income tax. 'While many
